content: We are thrilled to democratize Weta's industry-leading tools and bring the genius of Peter Jackson and Weta's amazing engineering talent to life for artists everywhere by combining the power of Unity and Weta Digital, the tools and technologies that build characters in scenes from the world's most iconic films such as Avatar, Lord of the Rings, and Wonder Woman, we will be able to enable an entirely new generation of creators to build, transform, and distribute stunning real-time 3D content.
